name: Tuberculosis clearance certification; exemption
text:
F.  Continuing Education
 
     []    Notwithstanding any law to the contrary, a person wishing to enroll at a campus within the University of Hawaii system solely to participate in a noncredit, short-term course, lasting less than fifteen days, shall not be required to present, as a condition to enrollment or otherwise, a tuberculosis clearance certification. [L 2006, c 75, pt of §2]
